name: Cats Vs Dogs
description:
Dash around a randomly generated maze grabbing pickups and weapons to help you seek and destroy your opponent... before they get you!
  • OLD SCHOOL GAMEPLAY: 2-4 Player local split screen multiplayer, including free-for-all & team deathmatch!
  • 7 weapons, including ROCKETS, LASERS and BOUNCY BALLS!
  • Randomly generated maps across 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS, so you'll never play the same map twice!
  • Collect POWERUPS to boost your arsenal or take a chance with a MYSTERY BOX!

Find (or make) some friends & tell them to bring a controller -- because this is classic offline play only, baby!

4 player local multiplayer mayhem! 2 player head-to-head! Bragging rights!
